name: Green Portal
description:
Soldier. Your mission is to locate and return the crystal fragments the zombies are drawing their energy from. We're counting on you soldier.

Controls : 

  • Move : Z / Q / S / D
  • Jump : Space
  • Sprint : Shift
  • Aim : Right click
  • Shoot : Left click
  • Reload Gun : R 
  • Exit the program : Escape
  • F11 : Fullscreen / windowed
